post.title: now user.json changed, it still sees me as the owner.
post.body: maybe should make this more smart in the future release: knows exactly who is the onwer of the site from the first loading of the data. currently it is checking when you tries to save things to the site, it is ok.

post.title: regarding the data publishing and sync algorithm
post.body: the game here is who is the true owner of the site; whatever data-default in the true owner computer should not be replaced by others; and the true owner's data should push and publish to all other peers;

post.title: man's two needs and two needs only
post.body:
- dating 
- building business

these two needs are perpetual. that is why we should always think about a better dating model. for zero, there is none, so let's build one. 

also, i think zero is particularly suitable for one special type of dating - blind and ananymous dating. we could make a simple rule:

- photo only;
- other things? never care and never ask.

post.title: my idea of the day - a dating site
post.body:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AJQcsrUhYUQ2mU96u61avviafjLwAmeNt

sure this is not perfect, but a start, truly a zerodate. 

do i expect woman just showing up? no. but man never stops hoping and trying.

i wish someone could team up with me to start working on a truer dating site on zero. 

what am i good for -

- business strategy and marketing
- extensive business experience in China (i have chinese background)
- a little bit of programming, modify and twist the existing programs and make it suit a similar purpose that seems what i could do
- man, i love woman, truly appreciate their beauty and aesthetic value. i have tried many dating sites and knows their pros and cons...(badoo, twoo....)
- dating logic is critical: some ai is needed and useful
- do i have dating experience? yes, very much, and successful

what i am hoping to team up with - 

- some programming guru, hands-on programmer that can put various resouces together ground up and make it work

is there investment?

- not initially
- but if we develop a working demo site, then i think we are in good shape to raise angle money
